item.title: RFK Jr.’s anti-vaccine panel realizes it has no idea what it’s doing, skips vote
item.description: With a lack of data and confusing language, the panel tabled the vote indefinitely.

item.title: Meet the latest anti-vaccine voices on RFK Jr.’s CDC advisory panel
item.description: The panel will meet this week and could limit access to measles, Hep B, COVID vaccines.

item.title: RFK Jr. adds more anti-vaccine members to CDC vaccine advisory panel
item.description: The panel will meet this week and could limit access to measles, Hep B, COVID vaccines.
